availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert P'Pool (Caldwell co., ky, farmer and wagonmaker )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and wagonmaker. Kentucky native. Son of Sarah F. P'Pool. Married to Serilda P'Pool. Father of Frances P'Pool and William P'Pool. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Wagonmaker in Caldwell County in 1860. Employed Seth P'Pool as a wagon maker in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 359B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 21.
